summary: "The Time Traveler's Wife" is a popular novel by Audrey Niffenegger about Henry, who time travels due to a genetic disorder, and his wife Clare, an artist who deals with his frequent disappearances. Niffenegger wrote it to express her feelings about failed relationships. The book became a bestseller and won several awards. It was turned into a movie in 2009 and an HBO series in 2022. Critics liked its unique take on time travel and the emotional depth of the characters, but some found the writing too dramatic.
title: The Time Traveler's Wife
